TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ToolStripControlHost extends System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem

summary.span: 承载自定义控件或 Windows 窗体控件。

span.span: Hosts custom controls or Windows Forms controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是的抽象基类， ，和。 is the abstract base class for , , and . 可以托管其他控件，包括自定义控件，通过两种方式： can host other controls, including custom controls, in two ways: - 构造派生的类。Construct a with a class that derives from . 若要完全访问托管的控件和属性，必须转换属性设置为的实际类它表示。To fully access the hosted control and properties, you must cast the property back to the actual class it represents. - 扩展，并在继承的类默认构造函数中调用基类构造函数传递派生的类。Extend , and in the inherited class's default constructor, call the base class constructor passing a class that derives from . 此选项可以用于在轻松访问常见控件方法和属性包装。This option lets you wrap common control methods and properties for easy access in a . 使用类以承载您的自定义的控件或任何其他 Windows 窗体控件。Use the class to host your customized controls or any other Windows Forms control. 若要自定义，派生自和创建自定义实现。To customize a , derive from and create a custom implementation. 如重写方法来处理事件引发所承载的控件，并可以将自定义功能放入属性，以改善所承载的控件。You can override methods such as to handle events raised by the hosted controls, and you can put custom functionality into properties to enhance the hosted control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何构造与控件，并使用来处理事件，并公开其部分成员到。The following code example demonstrates constructing a with a control, using to handle events, and exposing some of its members to the . [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost#13](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost/CPP/form1.cpp#13)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost/CS/form1.cs#13)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost/VB/form1.vb#13)]

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property DefaultSize As Size
protected: virtual property System::Drawing::Size DefaultSize { System::Drawing::Size get(); };

span.span: Gets the default size of the control.
The default of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性表示最初创建时的控件。The property represents the of the control when it is initially created. 如果是`true`，该控件自动调整大小根据方向。If is `true`, the control is sized automatically in accordance with the orientation. 您可以手动调整控件大小，通过设置其属性值设置为`false`。You can manually adjust the size of the control by setting its property value to `false`. > [!NOTE] > 为了维护更好的性能，不应设置的其构造函数中的控件。In order to maintain better performance, you should not set the of a control in its constructor. 首选的方法是重写属性。The preferred method is to override the property.

para.span: 重写时派生类中的属性，它是更可取的方法返回使用所需的维度，而无需重写所有实现。

span.span: When overriding the property in a derived class, it is preferable to return a with the desired dimensions rather than overriding all the implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法由公共`Dispose`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the method. `Dispose` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。`Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写 时，请注意不要引用在以前调用 时已释放的对象。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 有关详细信息并，请参阅[清理了非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)并[重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解事件发生的并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑更换与或将消息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`ToolStripControlHost1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ToolStripControlHost1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序相关联事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#569](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#569)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#569](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#569)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解事件发生的并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑更换与或将消息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`ToolStripControlHost1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ToolStripControlHost1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序相关联事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnBoundsChanged() cil managed

summary.span: 当 属性更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the property changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnEnter(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnEnter (e As EventArgs)
abstract member OnEnter : EventArgs -> unit override this.OnEnter : EventArgs -> unit

span.span: The control from which to subscribe events.
Subscribes events from the hosted control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重写方法以添加或防止控件事件的同步。Override the method to add or prevent the synchronizing of control events. 如果您重写和挂接事件此处，解除这些挂钩使用方法。If you override and hook up events here, unhook them by using the method. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置托管控件公开的事件处理的事件。The following code example demonstrates how to set up event handling for an event exposed by the hosted control. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost#14](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost/CPP/form1.cpp#14)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost#14](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost/CS/form1.cs#14)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost#14](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost/VB/form1.vb#14)]

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

param.name: m

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何构造控件并设置几个属性。The following code example demonstrates constructing a control and setting several properties. 若要运行此示例，请将代码粘贴到包含一个窗体名为`toolStrip1`，并调用`InitializeDateTimePickerHost`从窗体的构造函数或`Load`事件处理程序。To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a named `toolStrip1` and call `InitializeDateTimePickerHost` from the form's constructor or the `Load` event handler. MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Validated As EventHandler

summary.span: 在成功验证托管控件之后发生。

span.span: Occurs after the hosted control has been successfully validated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解事件发生的并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑更换与或将消息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`ToolStripControlHost1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ToolStripControlHost1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序相关联事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#577](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#577)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#577](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#577)]
